name: Buffalo Chicken Dip with Blue Cheese
author: chaylavie
summary: Buffalo chicken dip for cheese lovers who aren't afraid of blue cheese! Serve with tortilla chips, pita chips, crackers, or crostini.
ingredients: ½ cup freshly shredded white Cheddar cheese
¾ cup freshly grated mozzarella cheese
1 ½ pounds shredded cooked chicken breast
⅔ cup chunky blue cheese dressing
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened and cubed
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Combine Cheddar and mozzarella cheeses in a small bowl
Stir chicken, blue cheese dressing, and Buffalo sauce together in a medium bowl
Place cream cheese cubes in the bottom of a 9-inch baking dish
Sprinkle 1/2 of the Cheddar-mozzarella mixture over top to cover the bottom of the dish
Pour 1/2 cup of the Buffalo mixture over the cheese
Sprinkle with crumbled blue cheese and pour remaining Buffalo mixture over top
Bake on the middle or top rack of the preheated oven until cheese is bubbling, 15 to 20 minutes
